attributes.action: Abolish the early release of prisoners convicted of any violent crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the Home Office's own figures showing dramatic increases in the numbers of assaults, rapes and murders committed by paroled / early released convicts, we must insist the practice of early release is halted without delay. We believe that to do anything less is to criminally neglect the safety of the public.
